title: 284. Is Income Inequality Inevitable? (Earth 2.0 Series)
description: In pursuit of a more perfect economy, we discuss the future of work; the toxic remnants of colonization; and whether giving everyone a basic income would be genius -- or maybe the worst idea ever.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
